mapper.insert: insert into myboard_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (myboard_reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update myboard_board set reply = #{reply} where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate from myboard_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
